# pixar

> R data package to explore Pixar films, team, and reception data

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Instal from CRAN (WIP)
install.packages("pixar")

# Or install directly from GitHub
remotes::install_github("erictleung/pixar")
```
